header.title: Welcome!
header.description: This is a free system to work with cryptocurrency.

Please import an existing wallet
or create a new one.

stepThee.description: Click on the words to put them in the correct order.

stage1.phrase1: Restoring phrase is a master-key to your funds. Don’t pass it to anybody else.
stage1.phrase2: Watt Wallet never asks you to share your secret restoring phrase.

tokenWattBusdTopUp.footerMessage: To deposit Lock Pool you need to transfer {{coinSend}} 	o contract address. There is a commission {{coinCommission}}, of about $0.5.

errors.insufficientBalance: Entered amount exceeds the wallet balance: {{code}}

popUpConfirm.title: Confirmation
popUpConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to make a deposit of {{getAmount}} to your balance {{getCode}}? From your wallet {{fromCode}} will be withdrawn {{fromAmount}} {{fromAmountCode}}

popUpInfoP2PPool.title: P2P Pool
popUpInfoP2PPool.message: To create an automated bid for selling your WATT tokens on the secondary market you need to send your WATT tokens to P2P Pool smart-contract. Selling price is set up in advance. At the moment you deposit your BUSD on the smart-contract account, selling and sending  BUSD to you takes place automatically.
popUpInfoP2PPool.caption: If your bid is not purchased during one week, smart-contract will return your tokens and you need to send your tokens to sell again.

popUpWithdrawFunds.title: Funds withdraw
popUpWithdrawFunds.message: Enter amount you want to withdraw

roundInformation.untilEndRound: Before the end {{round}} of the round

footer.message: To make a deposit in the Lock Pool you need to transfer BUSD to the contract address. There is a commission in BNB, maximum $0.5.
footer.labelConfirm: I have read and I agree to the Agreement of WATT purchase

deal.errorWalletNotFount: Before depositing WATT you need to import wallet BUSD
deal.messageGetWattPopUp: You are sending {{amount}} BUSD, and you will receive {{amountWatt}} WATT instead

purchaseInformation.message: To buy WATT token click on «Buy» icon and send BUSD to the address of the company’s smart-contract.
purchaseInformation.caption: Smart-contract address will be entered automatically

p2PPoll.label: P2P Pool
p2PPoll.popUpCaption: To create an automated bid for selling your WATT tokens on the secondary market you need to send your WATT tokens to P2P Pool smart-contract. Selling price is set up in advance. At the moment you deposit your BUSD on the smart-contract account, selling and sending  BUSD to you takes place automatically.
p2PPoll.popUpMessage: If your bid is not purchased during one week, smart-contract will return your tokens and you need to send your tokens to sell again.

whitePaper.message: For more information about WATT token, check our Lite Paper

aboutTokenWatt.label: What is WATT?
aboutTokenWatt.messageAboutWatt: It is a token that measures your life energy capacity. You can reward your clients, friends, subscribers and fans. It has the power of ‘word-of-mouth’ and ‘6 handshakes’ principles. Thus, WATT token is becoming a powerful tool for stimulation of people and businesses collaboration.
aboutTokenWatt.energyLabel: Get the powerful energy of WATT,
aboutTokenWatt.energyMessage: by recommending everything that is useful for other people: products, services, specialists or information.
aboutTokenWatt.infoSectionLabel: Use the power of ENERGY for good!

aboutPreSaleWatt.label: What is Pre-Sale WATT?
aboutPreSaleWatt.caption: As a part of the project’s tokenomics launch, the company is conducting the Private sale of the tokens to the first members with a special price.
aboutPreSaleWatt.tokenPublicOfferingRoundsWillKickOff: Rounds of the token Public sale will start
aboutPreSaleWatt.messageReachingGoalsDeadline: In case of achieving one of the goals before the set time, the next selling round starts. If the round wasn’t sold out before the set time, all the unsold tokens are added to the tokens of the next round and are selling at the price of that round.
aboutPreSaleWatt.tokensPurchasedPresaleLocked: Tokens purchased at the Pre-Sale stage are frozen for 365 days starting from the moment of purchase. At the end of this period unfreezing of tokens takes place by equal parts during 35 days.
aboutPreSaleWatt.whatTeedBuy: To buy WATT token you need BUSD and a small amount of BNB (equal to about $5) to pay a commission.
